author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Geniee to take over development and sales business of CRM and SFA system for small and medium-sized companies
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Geniee Inc
* Says it will take over development and sales business of CRM and SFA system for small and medium-sized companies from a Tokyo-based firm on June 14
* Says it will pay 238 million yen to the Tokyo-based firm
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/r75gRP
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
